description:
MSP Toolkit provides some helpers and utilites for WP7 maded by Russian Microsoft Student Partners.
Includes: 
 - TrialHelper 
 - IsolatedStorageHelper 
 - TileImageGenerator
 - HtmlTextBox
Single-byte encodings: 
  windows1250 — Central and East European Latin 
  windows1251 — Cyrillic 
  windows1252 — West European Latin 
  windows1253 — Greek 
  windows1254 — Turkish 
  windows1255 — Hebrew 
  windows1256 — Arabic 
  windows1257 — Baltic 
  windows1258 — Vietnamese 
  windows874 — Thai
releaseNotes:
1. Func StringToTextBlock renamed to StringToTextBlockWithTransform
2. Func UriToImage renamed to UriToImageWithTransform
3. GenerateTile (message overload). Removed imageFormat parameter
4. GenerateTile (message overload). Margins and behavior updated
5. GenerateTile (message overload). New sample image
6. New GenerateImageBase overload that takes UIElement
7. Experimental GenerateGraphOnTile method for plotting graphs with tendencies
8. Sample for the GenerateGraphOnTile method
9. HTMLViewer added
title: MSP Toolkit
